title: Super Bowl Memories with Bryant McFadden & Pete Prisco, Insight on experience, routine, host cites & more (Football 1/23)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Bryant McFadden (1:00) and Pete Prisco (29:30) to share countless Super Bowl memories. First, two-time Super Bowl champion and 3-time Super Bowl participant, Bryant McFadden, joins Will to share the importance of experience and routine while also revisiting the Steelers victories in Super Bowls 40 and 43, while avoiding discussing their loss in Super Bowl 45. Then, Pete Prisco hops on the podcast to discuss his 30 years of covering Super Bowls. What's the best Super Bowl location? What's the best halftime show ever? How has the Super Bowl changed? Pete has all the answers!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
